bibl.title: Letter from Philip Showalter Hench to Luis B. Pogolotti, October 21, 1940

div1.p: Hench thanks Pogolotti for his help.

div1.head: Letter from Philip Showalter Hench to Luis B. Pogolotti, October 21, 1940
div1.opener:
October 21, 1940
Mr. Luis Pogolotti
Cuba 105
Havana, Cuba
My dear Mr. Pogolotti:
div1.p:
Permit me to send you a copy of the letter I have
just sent to Sr. Macia. I hope you will deem it satisfactory.
I cannot tell you how much I appreciate your continued help
in this matter, and I will be writing you after our return
from the dedication exercises.
div1.closer: Sincerely, P. S. Hench, M. D. psh:ds
